svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2021-03-08T00:20:36.770Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/88.0.4324.190 Safari/537.36" etag="ynk0lgZfKrWVlxn01stB" version="14.4.4" type="device" pages="2"><diagram id="QV_nSOEoS0BZ5OggN4qY" name="Container View"></diagram><diagram id="m9_gp1miZs6mZmQhndSu" name="Component View"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 131px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Single Page Application
(VueJS)
User interface that works both on desktop and mobile. User sends messages and receives responses from our chatbot. User interface communicates with the NlpJS API for it's responses.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 431px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
ChatBot API
(NlpJS)
Uses NodeJS and an NlpJS/ExpressJS package to receive HTTP requests from the client. Carries out the logic of the conversation. Sets up conversation and sends back replies from the chatbot after receiving messages from the user.
